item.title: Electronic Music is more than just a guy with a laptop.
item.description:
Electronic Music is more than just a guy with a laptop.

Do people roll their eyes at you and dismiss your opinion when you tell them about your "electronic music" experiences? Whether you're an artist, promoter or fan-it's happened to us all at one point or another. I put quotes around "electronic music" because music is in a state of constant change.

item.title: Can't stop the SCamp: 2016 brought Big GrizMatik, Menert band and more
item.description:
Can't stop the SCamp: 2016 brought Big GrizMatik, Menert band and more

Few music festivals nowadays remember to emphasize the true spirit of music, which is bringing people together-fans and artists alike-all collaborating to have a good time and shake their bodies. Summer Camp Music Festival has been around longer than Bonnaroo for this and countless other reasons.
